gs1:activityIdeas.title: Activity Ideas
gs1:activityIdeas.description: A link to ideas for using a product or engaging in other forms of entertainment, particularly with children.

gs1:allergenInfo.title: Allergen information
gs1:allergenInfo.description: A link to a description of the allergen information.

gs1:brandHomepageClinical.title: Information for professionals about this brand
gs1:brandHomepageClinical.description: A link to a brand presence aimed at clinical professionals.

gs1:brandHomepagePatient.title: Information for patients about this brand
gs1:brandHomepagePatient.description: A link to a brand presence aimed at patients.

gs1:consumerHandlingStorageInfo.title: Consumer handling and storage information
gs1:consumerHandlingStorageInfo.description: A link to information about safe handling and storage for consumer use.

gs1:epcis.title: EPC Information Services (EPCIS) repository
gs1:epcis.description: A link to an EPCIS repository of visibility event data.

gs1:epil.title: Electronic Patient Information Leaflet
gs1:epil.description: A link to an electronic patient information leaflet.

gs1:faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
gs1:faqs.description: A link to a set of frequently asked questions.

gs1:hasRetailers.title: Has Retailers
gs1:hasRetailers.description: A link to a list of retailers.

gs1:ingredientsInfo.title: Ingredients information
gs1:ingredientsInfo.description: A link to facts about ingredients.

gs1:instructions.title: Instructions
gs1:instructions.description: A link to instructions, such as assembly instructions, usage tips etc.

gs1:jws.title: JSON Web Signature
gs1:jws.description: A link to a JSON Web Signature

gs1:leaveReview.title: Leave a review
gs1:leaveReview.description: A link through which a review can be added.

gs1:masterData.title: Master data
gs1:masterData.description: A link to a source of structured master data for the entity. This is typically for B2B applications.

gs1:pip.title: Product Information Page
gs1:pip.description: A link to information specifically about the identified item, typically operated by the brand owner or a retailer of the product and aimed at consumers. It may include links to further information, product description, specifications etc.

gs1:purchaseSuppliesOrAccessories.title: Purchase supplies or accessories
gs1:purchaseSuppliesOrAccessories.description: A link to information about where supplies or accessories for the item can be purchased or ordered.

gs1:quickStartGuide.title: Quick start guide
gs1:quickStartGuide.description: A link to a description of the key features needed to be understood to begin using the item or interacting with something new.

gs1:recallStatus.title: Recall status
gs1:recallStatus.description: A link to information about whether the product has been recalled or not, typically an API.

gs1:recipeInfo.title: Recipe website
gs1:recipeInfo.description: A link to a recipe website.

gs1:registerProduct.title: Register purchase
gs1:registerProduct.description: A link to an entry point for registering ownership of a product including for warranty purposes.

gs1:relatedVideo.title: Related video
gs1:relatedVideo.description: A link to any video, or document that has an embedded video, that describes or relates to the identified item, organisation, or location in some way.

gs1:serviceInfo.title: Service information
gs1:serviceInfo.description: A link to service or maintenance instructions.

gs1:smartLabel.title: SmartLabel
gs1:smartLabel.description: A link to the product's SmartLabel page.

gs1:smpc.title: Summary Product Characteristics (SmPC)
gs1:smpc.description: A link to Summary Product Characteristics. To be used specifically when linking to information for healthcare professionals.

gs1:socialMedia.title: Social media
gs1:socialMedia.description: A link to a social media channel. The title will typically be replaced by the name of the channel.

gs1:support.title: Support
gs1:support.description: A link to a source of support such as a helpdesk, chat support, email etc.

traceability.title: Traceability information
traceability.description: A link to traceability information (includes track and trace).  Traceability information may be provided for consumption by humans or computers. If the target is an EPCIS repository, use gs1:epcis instead.

gs1:tutorial.title: Tutorial
gs1:tutorial.description: A link to a tutorial or set of tutorials, such as online classes, how-to videos etc.

gs1:verificationService.title: Verification Service
gs1:verificationService.description: A link to a GS1 Lightweight Messaging Service for verifying the status of a product, organisation, or location and its identifier.

gs1:whatsInTheBox.title: What's in the box?
gs1:whatsInTheBox.description: A link to a description of all the individual items in a packaged item.

gs1:sustainabilityInfo.title: Sustainability and recycling
gs1:sustainabilityInfo.description: A link to information relating to sustainability and recycling requirements or processes.

gs1:locationInfo.title: Location information
gs1:locationInfo.description: A link to a map, directions, or other location-related information.  For B2B location  information, see gs1:logisticsInfo.  For details specific to hours of operation, see gs1:openingHoursInfo

gs1:logisticsInfo.title: Logistics information
gs1:logisticsInfo.description: A link to B2B logistics information related to a physical location.

gs1:careersInfo.title: Careers information
gs1:careersInfo.description: A link to information about jobs, careers, or other employment opportunities associated to an organisation or location.

gs1:eventsInfo.title: Events information
gs1:eventsInfo.description: A link to event details.  For a page specifically for scheduling a reservation or booking an appointment, see gs1:scheduleTime.

gs1:menuInfo.title: Menu information
gs1:menuInfo.description: A link to menu details. This may include food menus, services, or other offerings provided by an organisation or at a location.  For details specific to allergens only, see gs1:allergenInfo .  For details specific to nutrition information only, see gs1:nutritionalInfo .  For details specific to ingredients only, see gs1:ingredientsInfo .

gs1:scheduleTime.title: Scheduling/Reservation
gs1:scheduleTime.description: A link to a site that offers information on scheduling, appointments, or reservations. This may or may not allow the user to book the reservation.

gs1:paymentLink.title: Make Payment
gs1:paymentLink.description: A link to a place where payments details are provided and/or payments can be made by the user.

gs1:userAgreement.title: Sign waiver/agreement/document
gs1:userAgreement.description: A link to an agreement or waiver.

statisticInfo.title: Statistics
statisticInfo.description: A link to information about statistics regarding an organisation, location, or other entity.

gs1:openingHoursInfo.title: Opening hours information
gs1:openingHoursInfo.description: A link to details on hours of operation.

gs1:homepage.title: Organisation Information Page
gs1:homepage.description: A link to general information about an organisation or brand. Typically the homepage of an organisation's website. It may include links to further information such as certifications, careers, payments, reservations, etc.

gs1:registryEntry.title: Entry in a register
gs1:registryEntry.description: A link to an entry in a register, such as a business register or register of locations. Such registers may act as alternative identifiers, such as official company numbers, LEIs, other location identifiers etc.

gs1:disassemblyInfo.title: Product disassembly
gs1:disassemblyInfo.description: A link to the instructions for dismantling/disassembly.

gs1:handlingEndOfLife.title: Product EOL handling
gs1:handlingEndOfLife.description: A link to the instructions for end-of-life handling as required by a product passport. The information will include instructions for reuse, repair, disassembly and recycling.

gs1:productPassport.title: Product Passport
gs1:productPassport.description: A link to the product passport which provides information on a product’s origin, durability, composition, reuse, repair and dismantling possibilities, and end-of-life handling.

gs1:recyclingInfo.title: Product recycling
gs1:recyclingInfo.description: A link to the instructions for recycling a product.

gs1:repairInfo.title: Product repair
gs1:repairInfo.description: A link to the instructions for the repair of a product.

gs1:reuseInfo.title: Product re-use
gs1:reuseInfo.description: A link to the information on how to re-use a product when it changes from one user to the other (like how to deal with exiting certifications or warranties, quality control instructions)

gs1:sorting.title: Sorting
gs1:sorting.description: A link to information related to sorting at a recycling centre or other reclamation process)
